name: Number_randomNumberTest
description: Unit tests for the randomNumber method in the Number class.

test_cases.name: testRandomNumberWithZeroDigits
test_cases.description: Tests the randomNumber method with zero digits, expecting the result to be 0.

test_cases.name: testRandomNumberWithNegativeDigits
test_cases.description: Tests the randomNumber method with negative digits, expecting the result to be 0.

test_cases.name: testRandomNumberStrictTrue
test_cases.description: Tests the randomNumber method with strict mode enabled, expecting the result to be between 100 and 999.

test_cases.name: testRandomNumberStrictFalse
test_cases.description: Tests the randomNumber method with strict mode disabled, expecting the result to be between 0 and 999.

test_cases.name: testRandomNumberNonStrict
test_cases.description: Tests the randomNumber method with strict mode disabled and 5 digits, expecting the result to be between 0 and 99999.
